metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4911 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - high.
metadata.Description: A buffer overflow was discovered in the GNU C Library's dynamic loader ld.so while processing the GLIBC_TUNABLES environment variable. This issue could allow a local attacker to use maliciously crafted GLIBC_TUNABLES environment variables when launching binaries with SUID permission to execute code with elevated privileges.

notes.Note: alexmurray> Upstream advisory states this was introduced in April 2021 (glibc 2.34) by commit 2ed18c5b534d9e92fc006202a5af0df6b72e7aca

criterions.comment: glibc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
